title: Bonds Sometimes Donâ€™t Make Sense
sub_head: German bunds have moved in lockstep with Treasurys, pushing yields positive for the first time since 2019, but this goes against the divergence in thinking at the Fed and the ECB
body:
A bond movie can sometimes lose the plot.
On Wednesday, yields on 10-year German bonds turned positive for the first time since 2019. This came a day after the benchmark 10-year Treasury yield reached their highest level in two years.
